text: Damir Zutic (Lithuanian: Damiras Žutičius; born 22 July 1993 in Croatia) is a Croatian footballer who last played for FK Atlantas in Lithuania.Damir Žutić napustio Goricu i pristupio litavskom Atlantasu 01Portal Žutić started his senior career with HNK Gorica, where he made five appearances and scored zero goals in the Croatian First Football League.at Soccerway After that, he played for FK Atlantas. == References == == External links == * 'I don't mind strangers coming in if they are of good quality, and here in my new environment I was very amazed by the pre-training shower ritual!' * Having a coffee with Zuc: 'In Lithuania, my fans came knocking on my door... and giving me support!' * My Lithuanian story: 'They call me Tony, I learn to cook, and they walk on the streets - planes!' * Atlantic defender Damiras Žutičius: "It will not be easy in Panevėžys" Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:Croatian expatriates in Lithuania Category:Croatian footballers Category:HNK Gorica players
title: Damir Žutić
